nodes.text: Scythe Squadron was a starfighter squadron that served in the Galactic Empire and utilized the TIE line fighters. Scythe Squadron participated in the climactic Battle of Endor alongside the Imperial Sector Fleet, the 181st Imperial Fighter Wing, and other Imperial units against the forces of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Scythe Squadron and members of the 181st pursued Red Squadron and Gold Squadron into the DS-2 Death Star II Mobile Battle Station.
